title: IIHL transfers money to creditors in first step to take over Reliance Capital
description: Earlier on August 1, creditors to Anil Ambani-promoted Reliance Capital, led by bond holders trustee Vistra ITCL (India) in a letter to Mauritius-based IIHL had warned the Hinduja company about consequences for failing to pay the Rs 2,750 crore to take over the debt-laden company by the July 31 deadline.
